pkgmetadata.longdescription: Call the 'NaPTAN' API Through R // An R wrapper for pulling data from the National Public Transport Access Nodes ('NaPTAN') API (https://www.api.gov.uk/dft/national-public-transport-access- nodes-naptan-api/#national-public-transport-access-nodes- naptan-api). This allows users to download 'NaPTAN' transport information, for the full dataset, by ATCO region code, or by name of region.
